summary: I did this drunk. Not bad if I do say so myself (It's Heavy Armor)
descriptionHtml:
So last weekend my friend was over, we were drinking and my friend said to me.
"WE SHOULD GET DRUNK THEN MAKE A MOD"
To which I responded,
"WE"RE HALF WAY THERE!!!"
So taking the texture of the Steelplate Armor and some images from Dracula Untold I made this.

Can be made under Daedric Smithing with the Ebony Smithing Perk.

The Stats are a little bellow Daedric Armor. I'd like to make a helmet but HOW DO YOU DO THAT??? Someone help me!
author: AngryBananaStudios
